name: rainbow snake
notes:
if you're looking for something bright and fun to crochet, then this rainbow snake pattern is perfect for you! 

with a light weight yarn and a 3.25 mm (d) crochet hook, you will be able to create a vibrant amigurumi snake in two different sizes. 

in the step-by-step instructions provided in my post, you will learn how to make the snake from start to finish. 

get ready to be amazed at your own colorful creation!

if you'd like to make the small stripey snake, you will need 1  mandala craft cake (in your chosen color) and a 3.25 mm (d) crochet hook. the finished small stripey snake measures 13 inches in length (not including the tongue) and 2.25 inches in  circumference (when stuffed).

the large rainbow snake measures 36.25 inches long (not including the tongue) and 3.25 inches in circumference.

♥ rhondda
